Package io.github.frc5024.lib5k.hardware.common.sensors.simulation

Class GyroSimUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.frc5024.lib5k.hardware.common.sensors.simulation.GyroSimUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class GyroSimUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A utility class for simulating gyroscope data based on two encoders

                   int id,
                   IDifferentialDrivebase drivebase,
                   double threadPeriod,
                   double rotationGain)
        Create a GyroSimUtil
        Parameters:
        name - Device name
        id - Device ID
        drivebase - Attached drivebase
        threadPeriod - Internal thread time in seconds
        rotationGain - Gain on the sensor reading (default 40)
